name: SceneSwitcher
description: An Alt + Tab System for GD.

transition-option.name: Transition Scene
transition-option.description: Change the transition to go to the scene in question (0 for no transition).

transition-speed-option.name: Transition Speed
transition-speed-option.description: Change the transition speed to go to the scene in question (0 for no transition).

animation-option.name: Enable Animation Hover
animation-option.description: Enhances buttons with dynamic animations when hovered over.

animation-speed-option.name: Animation Speed
animation-speed-option.description: Adjusts the speed of dynamic animations applied to buttons when hovered over.

size-buttons.name: Size
size-buttons.description: Adjusts the dimensions of buttons. Control the size of buttons according to your preference.

spacing-buttons.name: Spacing
spacing-buttons.description: Controls the distance between buttons. Customize the spacing between buttons to achieve the desired layout.
